about.paragraph: Hi Everyone, I am Bhuvan Amaravathi from Bengaluru, India. I am currently studying in BE-AIML at Global Academy Of Technology, Bengaluru. Apart from coding, some other activities that I love to do include being a good speaker and writing tech blogs. 'Strive to build things that make a difference!'
